txt.en: Talk to Hermáth Stormhammer at Amdân
Hermáth Stormhammer can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou have reflected upon one of the tales of Azanulbizar as recounted by Hermáth Stormhammer. You should talk to Hermáth Stormhammer.

'I thank you, dear reader, for reflecting upon my writings once again. It was not a simple task to recount them, but it was my duty on behalf of Durin's Folk.\n\n'It is my hope that like the many-faceted gem, new details and considerations will reveal themselves to you as you further explore these tales!'
Reflect upon a tale of Azanulbizar using the reflecting pool at Amdân

The Azanulbizar Reflecting Pool can be found at Amdân.\n\nYou should reflect upon any of the following tales at the Azanulbizar Reflecting Pool to advance this quest: 'Nár's Tale', 'Council of the Seven', 'Bonds of Oak and Iron', 'The Lord of Moria', or 'A Final Reckoning'.

After completing your study of Hermáth Stormhammer's account of the Battle of Azanulbizar, you have decided to reflect upon some of what you have learned.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Completing any of the following at the Azanulbizar Reflecting Pool will advance this quest: 'Nár's Tale', 'Council of the Seven', 'Bonds of Oak and Iron', 'The Lord of Moria', or 'A Final Reckoning'.</rgb>
After completing your study of Hermáth Stormhammer's account of the Battle of Azanulbizar, you have decided to reflect upon some of what you have learned.
